spiritsExplanation: The workout titled "Standing Posture Align" emphasizes alignment and posture improvement, indicative of a "Soothing & Restorative" spirit. The description specifically mentions conducting this yoga session in the "snowy mountains in New Hampshire," a strong indicator for an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit due to the natural and unique setting. The absence of vigorous activity references and a focus on alignment suggests it is not a high-energy or structured session. Music genres like chill and downtempo support the restorative aspect, providing a relaxed atmosphere. The playful and popular nature of songs listed in the playlist may add a light-hearted element, further reinforcing the soothing vibe. Thus, "Outdoor & Adventure" is rated at 0.9, strongly evident from the outdoor snowy setting, and "Soothing & Restorative" at 0.7, due to the yoga alignment focus and music choice.
